name: A Night In The Mountain
description:
A Night in the Mountain is a single-player puzzle game, that combines challenging spatial puzzles with a refreshing and unique death cycle mechanics that will push the mind of the player as he progresses through a seemingly endless cave. It’s been developed in the Unity 3D engine.

Main Theme: Make me Cry.

Diversifiers: Endless Cycle, Something Wrong is Not Right, Variations Under a Team, Count Me In, Hit The Box.
